bio.content: Hey, I'm Will, I run, I bike, and I create beautiful web experiences. Don't be shy, have a look around!

content.description: The most elegant solutions are those that are the easiest to understand, and have the most simplistic implementation. It is with this in mind that I always strive to create the most elegant simplistic solutions to any problem.
Just because something works, does not mean it is good. The best code is reusable, self contained and modular. Keeping this in mind always me to always be prepared for new ways of solving problems.
Despite other considerations, it actually doesn't count if you don't deliver. Therefore I also have a strong belief in delivering quality work within the bounds of any given project.
